A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed\, I’m easy to please when it comes to Star Wars. I even enjoyed the prequels and TFA. All my questions from the first film were never answered except one. What the hell was the point of Snoke in the first place? His character\, backstory\, and involvement in this movie make ZERO sense. Luke and Rey interactions are mediocre at best. So much potential. I always leave a Star Wars movie thinking deeply about it\, talking about it\, and anxious for the next. I feel nothing after this one. As a movie in general\, it’s meh. As a Star Wars film... are you effing kidding me Rian Johnson? Thank god you’re not doing the next one.
